Class GraduateStudent

java.lang.Object
Student
GraduateStudent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Searchable
public class GraduateStudent extends Student
The GraduateStudent class represents a student enrolled in a graduate program. It extends the Student class and adds specific information such as thesis topic.
